name: MouseEvent

values.name: xAndYAsPortionsOf
values.comment: decode the mouse position as a portion of a parent element (values between 0 and 1)

values.name: xAndYRelativeTo
values.comment: decode the mouse position relative to a parent element (values in px)

values.name: xAsPortionOf
values.comment: decode the mouse x position as a portion of a parent element (values between 0 and 1)

values.name: xRelativeTo
values.comment: decode the mouse x position relative to a parent element (values in px)

values.name: yAsPortionOf
values.comment: decode the mouse y position as a portion of a parent element (values between 0 and 1)

values.name: yRelativeTo
values.comment: decode the mouse y position relative to a parent element (values in px)
